name: Hot Roddin' Cider T-Shirt
description:
High-quality T-Shirt with the Hot Roddin' Cider logo on the front and our sexy Hot Roddin' Cider girl riding the piston rod, on the back. 

What started out as a couple guys trying to make some cheap hooch has now grown into something a bit more. 

Every dollar earned will go towards bringing our cider to market. Please support our efforts to bring you some great cider by buying more stuff.
